capabilities.name: Appointments Management - Citizen
capabilities.description: Enables Citizens to manage their Appointments online. Supports the use of Appointment slots that have been configured in Appointments Management - GP.

capabilities.name: GP Extracts Verification
capabilities.description: Supports Practice staff in ensuring accuracy of the data that is used with the Calculating Quality Reporting Service (CQRS).

capabilities.name: Referral Management
capabilities.description: Supports recording, reviewing, sending, and reporting of Patient Referrals. Enables Referral information to be included in the Patient Record.

capabilities.name: Resource Management
capabilities.description: Supports the management and reporting of Practice information, resources, Staff Members and related organisations. Also enables management of Staff Member availability and inactivity.

capabilities.name: Patient Information Maintenance
capabilities.description: Supports the registration of Patients and the maintenance of all Patient personal information. Supports the organisation and presentation of a comprehensive Patient Record. Also supports the management of related persons and configuring access to Citizen Services.

capabilities.name: Prescribing
capabilities.description: Supports the effective and safe prescribing of medical products and appliances to Patients. Information to support prescribing will be available.

capabilities.name: Recording Consultations
capabilities.description: Supports the standardised recording of Consultations and other General Practice activities. Also supports the extraction of Female Genital Mutilation (FGM) data for the FGM data set.

capabilities.name: Reporting
capabilities.description: Enables reporting and analysis of data from other Capabilities in the Practice Solution to support clinical care and Practice management.

capabilities.name: Scanning
capabilities.description: Support the conversion of paper documentation into digital format preserving the document quality and structure.
